Package Managers

Class CourseManager

java.lang.Object
Managers.CourseManager
public class CourseManager
extends java.lang.Object
CourseManager contains the logic to coordinate and realise use case

      Returns:

      Removes a student from wait list, if any, from waitlist and sends email to notify student
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Index object with student removed if changed, or original Index object if unchanged

    • checkIfIndexClash

      public boolean checkIfIndexClash​(java.lang.String newIndexID, java.lang.String matricNumber)
      Check if new index will have a clash in user's current time table
      Parameters:
      newIndexID - IndexID of the index to check
      matricNumber - matric number of student that is checking
      Returns:
      true if there is a clash, false if there are no clashes

    • checkIfTwoIndexClash

      public boolean checkIfTwoIndexClash​(java.lang.String newIndexID, java.lang.String oldIndexID, java.lang.String matricNumber)
      Check if two index can be swopped, if the new index will clash with user's current registered course After check, print appropriate error message if clashed The old index will be ignored as it need not to be considered
      Parameters:
      newIndexID - IndexID of new index
      oldIndexID - IndexID of old index
      matricNumber - matric number of student
      Returns:
      true if there is clash, false if there are no clashes
      See Also:
      Course, Index, Lesson, CourseUI, ErrorMessage

    • switchIndex

      public boolean switchIndex​(java.lang.String currentIndexID, java.lang.String newIndexID, java.lang.String matricNumber)
      Switches the student to be registered from current index to new index
      Parameters:
      currentIndexID - Index ID of current index
      newIndexID - Index ID of new index
      matricNumber - matric number os student switching indexes
      Returns:
      true if the switch was a success, false if the switch was not successful
      See Also:
      Course, Index

      Parameters:
      matricNumber - matric number of student
      selectedInd - Index ID of index that student will be added in

    • addStudentToWaitingList

      public boolean addStudentToWaitingList​(java.lang.String matricNumber, java.lang.String selectedInd)
      Add student into course wait list and print the appropriate message if add was successful/unsuccessful. Sends email to student after successful add
      Parameters:
      matricNumber - matric number of student
      selectedInd - Index ID of index that student will be added in
      Returns:
      true if student was added into wait list, false if student was not added into wait list
      See Also:
      GeneralMessage

      Returns:

    • isIndexFromSameCourse

      public boolean isIndexFromSameCourse​(java.lang.String indexNumber1, java.lang.String indexNumber2)
      Checks if two indexes are from the same course
      Parameters:
      indexNumber1 - Index ID of the first index to be checked
      indexNumber2 - Index ID of the second index to be checked
      Returns:
      true if both index are from same course, false if both indexes belong to different course

    • getWaitListPosition

      public int getWaitListPosition​(java.lang.String matricNumber, java.lang.String indexID)
      Retrieves the wait list position of student of Index specified in Index ID
      Parameters:
      matricNumber - matric number of student
      indexID - Index ID of index
      Returns:
      the number of position the user is at in the waiting list

    • notifySwopSuccess

      public boolean notifySwopSuccess​(java.lang.String currentStudentMatric, java.lang.String peerMatric, Course currentStudentCourse, Course peerCourse, java.lang.String currentIndex, java.lang.String peerIndex)
      Notifies user of the swop success, through email using NotificationAPI
      Parameters:
      currentStudentMatric - Matric number of current student
      peerMatric - Matric number of peer student
      currentStudentCourse - Course object to be swopped of current student
      peerCourse - Course object to be swopped of peer student
      currentIndex - Index ID of index belonging to current student
      peerIndex - Index ID of index belonging to peer student
      Returns:
      true if the email was sent successfully, false if the email was not sent
      See Also:
      NotificationAPI
